#summary Article definition

= Introduction =
Article is an object of the [World world]. [Creature Creatures] can do their [Activity activities] using articles. Every article have some properties:
  * when it expire (article older then this value disapear)
  * volume (amount of place taken by article in the FieldStock or CreatureBackpack 
  * way in which article influences creatures/fields during actions 
Articles are components of [Recipe recipes].
